document_data.name: Karad
document_data.mainbody: '''Karad''' was a member of the [[Zhentarim]] that operated out of their [[Zhentarim hideout (Risen Road)|hideout]] in some caves on the [[Sword Coast]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: He appeared to have a particularly strong dislike of the [[Flaming Fist]], especially those that accepted Zhentarim bribes but still threatened their business.
document_data.Possessions: Karad carried with him a [[shortbow]] that he wielded with some skill.
document_data.History: When [[Zarys]] ordered the demolition of their hideout in the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Karad was among those gathering their goods and setting up explosives for demolition of the caves.
